content.description: Finding the right metaphor to describe the Elan Ripstick 102 Skis is almost impossible, because they embody everything a hard ripper needs to have their best day of the season. Constructed with a Tubelite wood core that's light enough to flick around with ease, these sticks are reinforced with carbon for extra power and response. The Ripstick slays the hardpack and floats like a dream over the fluffy stuff. For everyone looking to dig deep and ski hard, the Elan Ripstick 102 Skis are your ticket to a high energy day packed with stoke. Treat yourself this season, get a Ripstick.
content.name: Elan Ripstick 102 Skis - Women's 2023
